oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Forbidden - Harden Trio performance; Sneaking Cross The Border - Harden Trio performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Forbidden, written by Yvonne Devaney, published by Hank's Music Inc., produced by Frank Jones, recorded on January 26, 1967 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia on August 1, 1967, and performed by the Harden Trio. Performance of Sneaking Cross The Border, written by Bobby Harden, published by Dahar Music Inc., produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on January 26, 1967 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia on March 20, 1967, and performed by the Harden Trio.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harden Trio
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) The Harden Trio performs "Forbidden" / (2:54) The Harden Trio performs "Sneaking Cross The Border"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; Columbia Records, Inc; Harden Trio; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982;
